body: Hello Mostapha, what is for the input Parallel in Sunlight Hours Analysis component? It need to be set to True if we have more Sunlight Hours Analysis components (one each object to analyse) working at the same time? Like in the image I attach. Actually i am working on a simulation to find the optimal reciprocal solution of three buildings (using Galapagos) so each time, in each Sunlight Hours Analysis component one building is the geometry and the other two are the context. Thank you Francesco [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/NqkuYxlxVg3TKuAfb1asRb-78r8iv4hvNqGJ0s6*I62SxmZgoiP5IEMd4fu1K4QRySPudZ0GMR8XYkEPxxitwgUg-iMpCJrV/Parallel.JPG)
topic: Parallel input in Sunlight Hours Analysis component
